str2: Lucas, Luke, Christian physician and writer of the Third Gospel and Acts. Contracted from Latin Lucanus; Lucas, a Christian.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A physician. From iaomai; a physician.
Demas, a helper of Paul in Rome. Probably for Demetrios; Demas, a Christian.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To greet, salute, pay my respects to, welcome. To enfold in the arms, i.e. to salute, to welcome.
